formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Network Address: \( \text{IP} \& \text{Subnet Mask} \) Broadcast Address: \( \text{Network Address} \mid \sim \text{Subnet Mask} \) Number of Hosts: \( 2^{(32 - \text{Prefix Length})} - 2 \)
